wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Balfour of Elwick FRSE (2 April 1810 – 30 March 1838) ) was a Scottish politician who sat in the House of Commons from 1835 to 1837. His brother was David Balfour (1811-1887) of Balfour FRSE.

response: * Thomas Balfour (1810–1838), MP for Orkney and Shetland
Notable residents include James Craufurd, Lord Ardmillan (2) and Thomas Balfour, James Kinnear and James Pitman, Lord Pitman (9) .
